subject: Order # SSN4417 didn't receive item
description_text:
Hi

I didnâ€™t receive the updated U-Shape mounting brackets for the Vam Pro Haptic reactor motors I ordered. My order number is SSN4417
I had also ordered a Plus X clutch pedal, but that seems to still be in transit, would the brackets be included with that package?

conversations.body_text: Hi Morgan Segal,    Yes, this clutch and U-bracket are shipped together from China.

Hi

I still have not received my order, it has been over three weeks and is the last pieces I need to complete my build. Tracking shows no movement. Any way to find out what has happened?

Thank you

Morgan 




>
